pages.text: On quiet days on your patio, you could observe that the $(l:resources/mermaids_brush)Mermaid's Gems$() have a very special attraction on marine life. Add to that, that they naturally float on water, you used one as a bobber.$(br2)Lo and behold, not only does it increase your success, but also have quite a few other interesting side effects...
